ygData.subject: Re: New, with a million questions
ygData.msgSnippet: peeps are other players,twinks are people who are in possesion of things that they re level is not currently capable of having gotten on they re own as far as
ygData.messageBody:
peeps are other players,twinks are people who are
in possesion of things that they're level is not
currently capable of having gotten on they're own as far as
class goes the ones you mentioned are all available in
the wood elf starting out in kelethin.one server is
pretty much the same as another with the exeption of the
pvp servers where players can kill each other and
loot some stuff from the kill.Myself i havent played
on pvp but intend to at some point,and as far as
characters you can have per server i think it's eight per so
you can almost have one of each class i really love
the hybrid classes ie ranger shadow knight paladin
cause they give you a little taste of two classes at
the same time<br>good luck with your start and hope
you run into people that will be helpful in your
journeys lot of nice people that play eq
